badRunDescription: If just a few TPC, iTPC or TPX RDO or sectors tripped, the run is still good. If any of the following happen, then this is a bad run. 1. beam lost. 2. critical errors. 3. Anode or cathod trip.
additionalPrompt: Does the run satisfy any of the above conditions? If any one condition is satisfied, the run is bad. Explain briefly.
promptFormat:
I will give you the run log for run {runID} below. If any of the following happen, then this is a bad run. 1. beam lost. 2. entry says there is critical errors. 3. Anode or cathod trip. If just a few TPC, iTPC or TPX RDO or sectors tripped, the run is still good. Does the run satisfy any of the above conditions? If any one condition is satisfied, the run is bad. Explain briefly.  This is the runlog for run {runID}:

***{content}
***

 Follow the instructions to the letter. If it is a bad run, say explicitly the phrase '{badrunKW}'. If it is not a bad run, say explicitly the phrase '{goodrunKW}'. If you can't determine, say '{goodrunKW}'.
reprompt: If it is a bad run, say explicitly the phrase '{badrunKW}'. If it is not a bad run, say explicitly the phrase '{goodrunKW}'. If you can't determine, say '{badrunKW}'. Just say the phrase.
